betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oThe slime sling lets you jump very high by holding right click.
The slime boots prevent fall damage and let you bounce when you hit the ground.
Right clicking the glider will let you glide.

Combine all three, and moving around will be a lot easier!

See the next quests for better means of movement!

§fSlime is gross, but it's a good way to get around.
Bouncing and gliding are fun!
